description:
Provides a new resource to manage [Action Trail](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/28804.htm).

-> **NOTE:** Available in 1.35.0+

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

EventRw.description: Indicates whether the event is a read or a write event. Valid values: Read, Write, and All. Default value: Write.

Name.description: The name of the trail to be created, which must be unique for an account.

OssBucketName.description: The OSS bucket to which the trail delivers logs. Ensure that this is an existing OSS bucket.

OssKeyPrefix.description: The prefix of the specified OSS bucket name. This parameter can be left empty.

RoleName.description: The RAM role in ActionTrail permitted by the user.

SlsProjectArn.description: The unique ARN of the Log Service project.

SlsWriteRoleArn.description: The unique ARN of the Log Service role.
